verses.html:
1
Haleluya, puji Allah!
Amin, amin, Haleluya!
Puji Allah Mahakasih,
sorak: “Haleluya!”

2
Haleluya, puji Yesus!
Amin, amin, Haleluya!
Puji Yesus, Juru slamat,
sorak: “Haleluya!”

3
Haleluya, puji RohNya!
Amin, amin, Haleluya!
Puji Roh Kudus yang kuasa,
sorak: “Haleluya!”

4
Mulia, mulia, Haleluya!
Mulia, mulia, Haleluya!
Lift your voice, and sing His praises,
“Puji, terus puji!”
